review:
Doctor was very friendly in diagnosing and explaining the issue. To prescribe right way of medication, I really appreciate and happy that he suggested x-ray which ruled out the concern of fracture.
Will be on medication for two weeks. Thanksuch Shrinidhi sir.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had swelling in my both knees for about 2 to 3 months. I had no clue why it came up without any injury. I waited for it to subside, But it did subside by itself and again it came back. I visited a differnt doctor before meeting Srinidhi but it didnt help. Then after reading practo reviews I came to this doctor. He asked me to take some blood tests and after reviewing the tests he said I have this swelling in my knee due to high uric acid and also may be due to RA factor.  He suggested me to take uric acid medicine for some days and the swelling reduced but still it didnt go fully. So then again he gave medicine for RA factor. later it went off. I was in a doubt still i have the issue but doctor said I have recovered already. And now I am completely already without any diet restrictions that I had to do during the treatment.

tags: None
review: We have had an amazing experience with Dr. Srinidhi. He goes above an beyond to get to the root cause of the ailment and provides constructive diagnosis to eliminate the actual issue that is causing discomfort. He pays additional attention to details we provide which helps in quick relief. Would strongly recommend visiting him for any orthopaedic issues.

review: I was having the ankle pain for more than year and have visited various doctors but it was not diagnosed properly and I was given with treatments and nothing worked. Later I have consulted dr Shrinidhi and he has diagnosed the problem in two weeks *** ***** *** ****. Thank you once again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor Srinidhi is very knowledgable and also very nice and approachable. He takes time to explain the problem in simple words and is never impatient with all the questions asked to him. His treatment helped me get back to walking with no pain at the fracture location.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Since it was Apollo clinic I thought the treatment would be better. Instead the doc judged me for the cause of my injury and kept pushing me to get surgery asap or else I'll lose the mobility of my hand. Didn't even bother to examine my hand properly. *** **** ******* ** *** ****** *** ******* ********* * The bandage layer was totally missing due to which the upper layer got into my skin and the removal of it was long and painful. Helpful enough i got it removed from somewhere else.I don't recommend it.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ******** ** * ***** **** Very patient and understanding. I went to him with pain near  shoulder joints n pain in thigh muscles. Before going to him I already had cortisone injection and 10 days physiotherapy. pain was very unbearable. he suspected something wrong systemically and recommended blood tests. turns out I had vit D deficiency. he gave vit D injection and calcium tablets  and bingo, problem went away just like that. Awesome doc. **** ************* *** ******** ** *** ********. highly recommended.

review: I visited Dr Srinidhi for leg pain which had persisted for nearly 6 months.He diagnosed it to be a hamstring injury, advising rest, ice treatment and prescribing medicines.I had mostly recovered by the time of the 2nd consultation and did not need to visit a 3rd time.The pain has been entirely treated and I no longer feel it even when running.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr Shrinidhi explained the cause in a very layman terms. He gave advices on exercise and daily habits so that the pain can be reduced. He didn't prescribe lot of medicine which is a good thing. I am feeling much better now. I am also following his advices on daily basis. He is a very friendly doctor.
